Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……女王や<Blue>王の盾<White>の目的を 聞いた事はないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Do you have any idea what the Queen and the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> are up to?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私がトーマから与えられたのは、 <Eugene>とその仲間を殺せって命令だけ。
Entry.EnglishText: The only orders I got from Tohma were to kill Eugene and his companions.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつ、どこで、何をするか、それ以外の 情報を与える必要なんてないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: He didn't give me any other information other than the when, where, and how because that's all I needed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 暗殺の道具だった私にはね……
Entry.EnglishText: I was but a tool to carry out assassinations...
